title: Enhancing Technical Documents Retrieval for RAG
summary: This paper introduces Technical-Embeddings, a framework to optimize semantic retrieval in technical documentation by leveraging LLMs to generate expanded query representations that capture user intent and improve dataset diversity.
usefulness_reason: Score 60 assigned because the paper focuses on "optimizing semantic retrieval" and "capturing user intent" by enhancing query representations, which is relevant to understanding and utilizing contextual information within a dataset.
